mapper.insert: insert into knowledge (id, description, super_knowledge_id, mastery_max, mastery_min) values(#{data.id}, #{data.description}, #{data.superKnowledgeId}, #{data.masteryMax}, #{data.masteryMin});
mapper.update: update knowledge set description = #{data.description}, super_knowledge_id = #{data.superKnowledgeId}, mastery_min = #{data.masteryMin}, mastery_max = #{data.masteryMax}, id = #{data.id} where id = #{data.id}
